iplb_server_edit_port_tip: Port attached to your server (1 to {{portMax}}). By default, uses the port that connects the server to the farm.
iplb_server_edit_advanced_options_info: The most recent default values have been pre-set. You can modify them at any time.
iplb_server_edit_cookie_tip: Cookie value used for cookie stickiness
iplb_server_edit_chain_tip: The value of the intermediary SSL certificate. Allow server certificate verification (Avoid man-in-the-middle attacks)
iplb_server_edit_proxyProtocolVersion_ti: The PROXY protocol version to be used, see {{link}}
iplb_server_request_error: An error has occurred loading your data.
iplb_server_add_error: An error has occurred adding the server farm: {{message}}
iplb_server_add_success: The server has been successfully added.
iplb_server_update_error: An error has occurred modifying the server: {{message}}
iplb_server_update_success: The server has been successfully modified.
iplb_server_delete_question: Are you sure you want to delete the following server: {{server}}?
iplb_server_delete_error: An error has occurred deleting the server: {{message}}
iplb_server_delete_success: The server has been successfully deleted.
